description:
Legendary costumes for your SAMURAI WARRIORS officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Costumes for:
Yukimura Sanada, Kenshin Uesugi, Kunoichi, Shingen Takeda, Kanetsugu Naoe, Kotarō Fūma, Kai, Ujiyasu Hōjō, Aya, Nobuyuki Sanada, Kagekatsu Uesugi, and Lady Hayakawa

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Legendary Costumes Samurai Warriors Pack 4
